data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Neotropical water snake Hydrops triangularis (Serpentes, Colubridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De, Nelson R., Lema, Thales De (2008): Taxonomic revision of the Neotropical water snake Hydrops triangularis (Serpentes, Colubridae). Zootaxa 1685: 55-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180499
